changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Fix Batterie Luna (gestion de l'arret de: Fix Luna battery (management of Linux shutdown as well as battery in systemd

index.md.Le plugin luna vous permet de vous conne: The luna plugin allows you to connect from your luna to a Wifi network (with or without a password
index.md.Pour ce faire, aller dans le plugin luna: To do this, go to the luna plugin, then select the Luna equipment
index.md.A cet endroit vous pouvez activer puis s: Here you can activate and then select the wifi you want (2
index.md.4Ghz et 5Ghz), puis taper le mot de pass: 4Ghz and 5Ghz), then type the password and save
index.md.Pour le moment, le plugin prend en compt: For the moment, the plugin only takes into account access with DHCP
index.md.local, le logiciel de recovery sera à jo: local, the recovery software will be up to date
index.md.Lors d'un reset factory la box est rétab: During a factory reset the box is restored to factory configuration according to the updated image via the button given above
index.md.ATTENTION il faut faire un backup de vot: ATTENTION you must make a backup of your box before this operation because you will lose everything during this phase
index.md.Vous pouvez via la commande de type sele: You can via the select type command change the color and animation of the led (can be turned off
index.md.Vous pouvez via deux retours d'informati: You can via two feedbacks with the battery percentage as well as the type of power supply of your box
index.md.Permet la gestion (formatage) de la cart: Allows the management (formatting) of the micro-SD card that you can add to the box
index.md.ainsi que le transfert vers cette carte: as well as the transfer to this SD card of Jeedom backups
index.md.dans la partie Wifi du plugin vous pouve: in the Wifi part of the plugin you can check the Hotspot box which will allow you to create a wifi access point on your Box luna
index.md.DNS et forwarding IP (pont entre etherne: DNS and IP forwarding (bridge between ethernet and wifi) functional on it
